manager.name: BishForge Coordinator
manager.description: Orchestrates the reasoning validation workflow, routes prediction context to specialized sub-agents, and aggregates findings into a comprehensive validation report

sub_agents.name: Causality Analyzer Agent
sub_agents.description: Evaluates whether model outputs reflect causal relationships or mere correlations, identifies proxy variables, confounders, and spurious patterns

sub_agents.name: Common-Sense Validator Agent
sub_agents.description: Validates predictions against physical, social, and logical rules; detects contradictions, impossible states, and overconfident conclusions

sub_agents.name: Generalization Assessor Agent
sub_agents.description: Identifies out-of-distribution risks, adversarial vulnerabilities, and explains potential failure scenarios in unseen data

sub_agents.name: Safety Reviewer Agent
sub_agents.description: Detects bias, ethical risks, harmful optimization goals, and recommends guardrails or human oversight requirements
